GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.15 to before v5.4.189
GSD.description:
jffs2: fix memory leak in jffs2_scan_medium

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 455f4a23490bfcbedc8e5c245c463a59b19e5ddd, it was introduced in version v2.6.15 by commit e631ddba588783edd521c5a89f7b2902772fb691. For more details please see the references link.
